source.interface: Interface indicating that the chromosome represents a permutation of objects. type of the permuted objects 2.0 $Id: PermutationChromosome.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $ Permutes the sequence of objects of type T according to the permutation this chromosome represents. For example, if this chromosome represents a permutation (3,0,1,2), and the unpermuted sequence is (a,b,c,d), this yields (d,a,b,c). sequence the unpermuted (original) sequence of objects permutation of sequence represented by this permutation
